name: Obstacle Course (Shallamayne)
description:
Play as Morphy, a cube with the unique ability to change forms. Avoid all the coloured obstacles and race to the end of the level as fast as possible! Share your best time in the comments.

Best played with an xbox controller.

Controls:

WASD / Left joystick - Movement

Keyboard Q / Controller A - Flatten

Keyboard E / Controller B - Elongate

Hold space / LT / RT - Slow movement

Keyboard R / Controller X - Reset
